statements: UPDATE multi_factor_authentication SET username='john_doe', password='new_password' WHERE user_id=123;
UPDATE multi_factor_authentication SET email='jane_doe@example.com', phone_number='+1234567890' WHERE user_id=456;
UPDATE multi_factor_authentication SET phone_number='+1234567890', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id=1
UPDATE multi_factor_authentication SET password='newpassword', username='johndoe' WHERE user_id=2
UPDATE users SET username = 'john_doe', password = 'newpassword123', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE authentication_log SET action = 'Login', timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE log_id = 3;
UPDATE users SET username='alice', email='alice@example.com' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE authentication_log SET action='login', timestamp='2022-05-20 08:30:00' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE verification_codes SET created_at='2023-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE user_id=2 AND code='123456';
UPDATE users SET username='john_doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE verification_codes SET created_at='2022-01-15 12:30:00', code='12345' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE authentication_logs SET success=1, action='Login' WHERE log_id=5;
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com', phone_number='123-456-7890' WHERE user_id=100
UPDATE verification_codes SET is_verified=TRUE, code='456789' WHERE user_id=200
UPDATE users SET password_hash = 'new_password_hash' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE security_questions SET security_answer = 'new_security_answer' WHERE user_id = 2 AND question_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET username = 'new_username', password_hash = 'new_password' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE security_questions SET security_question = 'New Security Question', security_answer = 'New Security Answer' WHERE user_id = 2 AND question_id = 3;
